subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A barrier to Lance Armstrong returning to the Tour de France was removed Friday when France's anti-doping agency said he would not be sanctioned for a delayed drug test.
snippet: A barrier to Lance Armstrong returning to the Tour de France was removed Friday when France's anti-doping agency said he would not be sanctioned for a delayed drug test.
